localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Access your favourite Websites and Web Apps easily and quickly. Save the websites addresses and give them a custom name and icon, then easily access them from the Menu Bar or in an Always-on-Top window. Freely resize the menu window for a better experience
blogPost.body: Access your favourite Websites and Web Apps easily and quickly. Save the websites addresses and give them a custom name and icon, then easily access them from the Menu Bar or in an Always-on-Top window. Freely resize the menu window for a better experience
blogPost.title: Surf - Access any website or web app from menu bar/floating window
blogPost.author: Lucian Boiangiu

localize.description: 轻松快速地访问您喜爱的网站和Web应用程序。保存网站地址并为其指定自定义名称和图标，然后从菜单栏或始终在顶部的窗口轻松访问它们。可自由调整菜单窗口的大小以获得更好的体验
localize.tagline: 从菜单栏/浮动窗口访问任何网站或Web应用程序

localize.description: 輕鬆快速地訪問您喜愛的網站和Web應用程序。保存網站地址併爲其指定自定義名稱和圖標，然後從菜單欄或始終在頂部的窗口輕鬆訪問它們。可自由調整菜單窗口的大小以獲得更好的體驗
localize.tagline: 從菜單欄/浮動窗口訪問任何網站或Web應用程序

next.excerpt: Simply Snack is the easiest way to keep track of your food and diet. Log your food easily by just taking a picture of it. There’s no need for long descriptions or dull questions – and no need to stress about what you should or shouldn’t eat.
next.title: Simply Snack - Your daily meals at a glance.

localize.description: 简单地说，零食是记录你的食物和饮食的最简单的方法。只需拍一张照片，就可以很容易地记录你的食物。不需要冗长的描述或枯燥的问题-也不需要强调你应该吃什么或不应该吃什么。
localize.tagline: 您的日常用餐一目了然。

localize.description: 簡單地說，零食是記錄你的食物和飲食的最簡單的方法。只需拍一張照片，就可以很容易地記錄你的食物。不需要冗長的描述或枯燥的問題-也不需要強調你應該喫什麼或不應該喫什麼。
localize.tagline: 您的日常用餐一目瞭然。
